### PyBear

Heavily obfuscate your code with ease, it will be turned into machine bytecode and safely run in a virtual environment, all while protecting the source!

## How to use it:

All you have to do is run ``bytecode_vm.py``!

Enter in 1 if you want to load in a program normally,
Enter in 2 if you want to load in a program from a url.

Heres a simple example program: ``https://raw.githubusercontent.com/uneasily/pybear/main/testing_program.pyb``
Heres what they look like normally: ````
